The Kinſlạða

The Kinſlạða is a genealogical record of The Dọlita

Generation 1
Dọður, God of Death
Ex-Husband of Lịðin
Lịðin, Goddess of Life
Ex-Wife of Dọður
Sister of Tị́mur
Tị́mur, God of Time
Brother of Lịðin

Generation 6

These Deities govern specific areas; islands, landmarks, lakes, oceans, etc.

The Mạkra
  • Not Deities
  • Favoured mortals of a deity, giving them a fraction of their power
  • Each deity has their own system or reasoning for choosing a Mạkra
    • Some like to follow certain bloodlines, while others do not
    • Some deities turn their favoured mortal into a Mạkra when they reach adulthood, some when the mortal proves themself, and others do so in the mortal’s time of need
    • Some enjoy the Chaos
  • Orders of magnitude stronger than a Wizard, but much weaker than actual gods
  • Each Deity has a Mạkra
  • This status grants a mortal significant political power
  • Most historical heroes are Mạkra
  • Those that aren't are even more legendary
  • Being gifted power by multiple deities is extraordinarily rare, but not impossible
  • There have only been several in history
  • Once, and only once, there was a Mạkra of Dọður, Lịðin and Tị́mur, prior to The Vạlda
  • This Mạkra was The First
  • When a Mạkra dies, a new Mạkra is chosen
  • A Mạkra can lose their status if they do something that angers their patron, without a reasonable explanation
